Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute near California/Belmont
ShortDescription: #94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Belmont.

Northbound buses will operate via California, Addison, Rockwell, then will wait recovery time.

Southbound buses will operate via Addison, Western, Belmont, then resume their normal route on California

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing with significant delays at Harlem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing with significant delays at Harlem due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
